title: No Chest after S Rating
body:
Hello,

I just played a Game and earned an S rating. I still have one Chest available but I didnt recieve one. Is this a known Bug? Because I would like to have my Chest :).

replies.body: if you go to your profile and click on the champions you own, it will show you which champions you can earn chests on and which you cannot.
Oh okay I didnt know that i can only get a chest once for each Champion. I did indeed already earned a chest with that Champion. Thank you all for the Infos. GL and HF

1. Do you own the champion you played?
2. If you do own that champion, have you already gotten an S- and up while playing said champion or been in a game with a premade group where someone else got an S- and up while playing this champion.

You have A: gotten a punishment recently or B: already gotten a chest on that champion this season. Both prevent you from getting more chests.

The once-per-season restriction is very annoying.

Did you already earn a chest with that champion? Note that you can earn a chest without getting an S on that champion if you're in a group with someone else who earned an S while you played said champion.
